review_data.title: Leider ungenügend
review_data.content: Wir hatten Bowls mit Thunfisch und dieser war leider stark durchzogen und somit nicht essbar! Sehr enttäuschend

review_data.title: High quality poke bowls! Delicious.
review_data.content: High quality poke bowls! Delicious. They are always friendly and fast. You can also customize your order. I love it for a good and healthy lunch

review_data.title: Köstlichste Poké Bowls von Zürich

review_data.content: Bin öfter über Mittag im kaisin. Kann ich nur wärmstens weiterempfehlen. Sehr hohe Qualität, gesund und super nettes Personal. Gerne...More

review_data.title: Great poké choice in Zürich
review_data.content: Great poké choice in Zürich for delivery. Love the food, the choices and the packaging. A great and healthy choice.

review_data.title: Essen lecker - aber Wegwerfgeschirr, ernstahft?

review_data.title: Delicious Poke Bowls
review_data.content: Absolutely delicious poke bowls! The choices for your base, protein, toppings etc are plentiful and everything tasted very fresh. The staff was friendly and the atmosphere was great.

review_data.title: always a perfect option for a yummy lunch bowl...
review_data.content: The Kaisin is not an insider's tip anymore, but for a good reason...the bowls are just yummy and the staff is always kind and helpful with a smile on their face. Highly recommended for a great and healthy lunch.

review_data.title: Super lecker!
review_data.content: Grosszügige Auswahl an Toppings, sehr leckere Saucen und frischer Fisch. Danke, dass es so was in Zürich gibt. Weiter so...!

review_data.title: Delicious Poke bowls to take-away or eat-in
review_data.content: They serve bowls according to your taste. You can choose from a base like rice and add toppings and fish with a dressing of your choice. Healthy & delicious.

review_data.title: Delicious!
review_data.content: Good choice if you want to eat an incredible tasty sushi / chicken poke bowl. Location is in the centre of Zurich. The service is friendly and the food is fresh. Menu offers many varieties of sets and different toppings.

review_data.title: Unglaublich leckere Poke Bowls!
review_data.content: Incredibly tasty poke bowls! Super Location und sehr sehr nettes Personal!! :) Die Siganture Bowls sind richtig lecker aber auch...More

review_data.title: Delicious
review_data.content: Fresh and tasty ingredients and everyone very friendly. It’s nice how you can choose your own ingredients or pick on of the standard bowls. Will definitely come again.

review_data.title: Einmal Kaisin Poké, immer Kaisin Poké
review_data.content: Mitten in der City versteckt sich dieses tolle kleine Restaurant, wo man die besten Poké Bowls der Stadt Zürich erhält....More

review_data.title: Best poke bowls!!!
review_data.content: Hands down. Best poke bowls in zurich. Only fresh ingredients! Nice choice of toppings. 5/5! I go at least once a week! Top!

review_data.title: BIG TIME💯!

review_data.title: Tasty Bowls
review_data.content: Love these tasty bowls! Annnnd they offer homemade iced tea. Absolutely lovely. Coming almost daily. Better than Ona Poke and any other sushi restaurant.
